Desc.entry: A voluntary organisation aiming to promote the values, culture and artistic expression of Liberia. Seeks to provide community education to aid the economic, social and technological development of all Liberians living in and around Sheffield. Facilitates links and communication between its members, ethnic minority groups, government bodies and the local authority.

ContactName.entry: Mr Prince Taylor, Chairperson/Mrs Matina Kromah

category.entry: BLACK AND MINORITY ETHNIC PEOPLE - COMMUNITY ORGANISATIONS
